sentence: And the true measure of Trump's influence on the Republican primaries won't come until more prominent politicians he's marked for extinction come up in other states people like Rep. Liz Cheney in Wyoming and Gov.
title: The establishment strikes back: 5 takeaways from the Texas primary

sentence: The small anti-Trump faction of the party appears to have at least three candidates, the most impressive of whom is U.S. Representative Liz Cheney of Wyoming never mind that she may well lose her House seat in 2022.
author: Jonathan Bernstein
title: On Ballot or Not, 2024 GOP Race Is All About Trump
